Screenshots Commands Move: arrow keys or WASDAttack: VWaveform: hold B and use arrow keys or WASD to move the aimerChange waveform: M and NEntanglement: click on objectBreak entanglement: GKnown issues
  • We couldn't test the Mac version
  • If you pause the game while a dialogue is shown a visual glitch happens which makes the gameplay very difficult. In case it happens we suggest to restart the level, we are working on it :)
